targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'in_recovery_int')::int
FROM
  wal
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time,
  (data->'postmaster_uptime_s')::int
FROM
  wal
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg(((c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag)) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as qps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  time,
  avg(avg) as "avg_query_runtime"
from (

select
$__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
queryid,
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid,
          time
        from stat_statements
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and not tag_data->>'query' like '%$2)::int8 as epoch_ns,%' /*trying to not include queries by pgwatch itself*/
        window w as (partition by tag_data->>'queryid' order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

SELECT
  time,
  (data->'size_b')::int8
FROM
  db_size
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg(((ins-ins_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "INSERT",
  avg(((upd-upd_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "UPDATE",
  avg(((del-del_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "DELETE"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_inserted')::int8 as ins, lag((data->>'tup_inserted')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          (data->>'tup_updated')::int8 as upd, lag((data->>'tup_updated')::int8) over w as upd_lag,
          (data->>'tup_deleted')::int8 as del, lag((data->>'tup_deleted')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ins >= ins_lag and upd >= upd_lag and del >= del_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Tuple  ins. / upd. / del. statistics ($agg_interval avg, log. scale)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((c - c_lag + r - r_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "TPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where time > time_lag and c >= c_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "QPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where time > time_lag and c >= c_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((hit-hit_lag)::numeric / ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag)))*100 as "Shared buffers hit ratio",
  avg((roll-roll_lag)::numeric / ((roll-roll_lag) + (comm-comm_lag)))*100 as "TX rollback ratio"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'blks_hit')::int8 as hit, lag((data->>'blks_hit')::int8) over w as hit_lag,
          (data->>'blks_read')::int8 as read, lag((data->>'blks_read')::int8) over w as read_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as roll, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as roll_lag,
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as comm, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as comm_lag,
          time
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where (hit > hit_lag or read > read_lag) and (roll > roll_lag or comm > comm_lag)
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Shared Buffers hit ratio + Rollback ratio ($agg_interval avg.)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((wal-wal_lag) / (etime-lag_etime)) as "WAL rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8 as wal, lag((data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8) over w as wal_lag,
          extract(epoch from time) as etime,
          lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w as lag_etime,
          time
        from wal
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where wal >= wal_lag and etime - lag_etime > 0
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((data->>'idle')::int8) as idle,
  avg((data->>'idleintransaction')::int8) as "idle in transaction",
  avg((data->>'waiting')::int8) as waiting,
  avg((data->>'active')::int8) as active,
  avg((data->>'av_workers')::int8) as av_workers
from backends
  where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1
order by 1

select
  time,
  avg(avg) as "avg_query_runtime"
from (

select
$__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
queryid,
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid,
          time
        from stat_statements
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and not tag_data->>'query' like 'pgwatch._generated' /*trying to not include queries by pgwatch itself*/
        window w as (partition by tag_data->>'queryid' order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

select
  time,
  sum(seq_scan) as seq_scan,
  sum(idx_scan) as idx_scan
from (
  select
    $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
    table_full_name,
    avg((((scan - scan_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))) as seq_scan,
    avg((((idx_scan - idx_scan_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))) as idx_scan
  from (
          select 
            (data->>'seq_scan')::int8 as scan, lag((data->>'seq_scan')::int8) over w as scan_lag,
            (data->>'idx_scan')::int8 as idx_scan, lag((data->>'idx_scan')::int8) over w as idx_scan_lag,
            time, lag(time) over w as time_lag,
            tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name
          from table_stats
          where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
          and (data->>'table_size_b')::int8  > 1e9
          and coalesce((data->'is_part_root')::int8, 0) = 0
          window w as (partition by tag_data->>'table_full_name' order by time)        
    ) x
    where scan >= scan_lag and time > time_lag
    group by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Seq. / Idx. scans ($agg_interval avg. rate., >100MB tables, log. scale)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg(((tb-tb_lag)*extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval)) / (etime - lag_etime)) as "Temp bytes"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'temp_bytes')::int8 as tb, lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::int8) over w as tb_lag,
          (extract(epoch from time))::int8 as etime,
          (lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w)::int8 as lag_etime,
          time
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where tb >= tb_lag
group by 1
order by 1

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics ORDER BY 1;
list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics ORDER BY 1;
